info.name: [SH17A] PicoPaint (59c)
info.description:
It has been done before...

Fitting a quine in two tweets was hopeless.  At 5 chars encoded per int, the boilerplate and the (1+11/5)x effective cost of each character leaves only 40 to implement decoding.  If I get it under 1000 I will release it though.

renderpass.code: #define mainImage( f, e ) if (length(iMouse.xy-e)>5.) discard; f++
renderpass.name: Image
